text: Punto Fa, S.L., trading as Mango, is a Spanish fast-fashion company. It was founded in Barcelona by brothers Isak Andic and Nahman Andic.The world's 50 Richest Jews: 31-40: Isak Andic Jerusalem Post, 7 September 2010 It designs, creates and sells women's and men's clothing and accessories. ==References== Category:Fashion houses
title: Mango (retailer)
